DOC.criteria: Ages : 20 year 74 year Genders : Both The severity hypertension : mild moderate ( WHO/ISH criterion stage III ) Systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) > /= 140 and/or diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) > /= 90 ( untreated hypertension case ) Any follow medical condition : Severe essential hypertension ( DBP > 110 ) Secondary malignant hypertension History symptoms cerebral vascular disease History myocardial infarction History angina pectoris , atrial fibrillation , heart failure arrhythmia Renal dysfunction ( serum creatinine > 2.1mg/dl ) Severe hepatic dysfunction Uncontrolled diabetes Allergy , drug sensitivity chronic skin disease Peptic ulcer disease Current pregnancy lactation Depression need treat Hypertension control antihypertensive medication
